text: Today I didn't have much time for research but I did continue my practice regimen of 100 circles, and 100 ovals. I also added lines today first horizontal, and vertical per instructions. I am thinking of bumping the daily number up a couple hundred since the exercises are becoming easier.
Started experimenting with AI art generation today. The results are fascinating - it's like having a collaborative partner that interprets my prompts in unexpected ways.
Visited the local art museum for inspiration. Spent hours studying the brushwork of the impressionists. Can't wait to try incorporating some of those techniques into my next piece.
Purchased new watercolor supplies today. The pigment quality is noticeably better than what I was using before. Looking forward to seeing how this affects my landscape studies.
Completed my first portrait that I'm actually proud of! After months of practice, I'm finally starting to understand how to capture likeness. Still a long way to go, but progress feels good.
